name: Affogato AI
long_description: Affogato is an AI media creation platform that helps businesses, marketers, and creators produce high-quality content using hyper-realistic AI characters. With Affogato, you can create talking videos, lifestyle images, and product visuals without the need for costly shoots or editing tools. Whether you’re promoting a product, running ads, or building a brand presence online, Affogato gives you powerful, easy-to-use tools to bring your ideas to life—quickly, affordably, and at scale. It’s the fastest way to turn your product into a story that sells.
one_liner: Affogato lets you create marketing content with AI characters.
